nodes.bodyText: Code duplication.. Maybe create abstract class?
why not ConcurrentHashSet? It asks to eat?
There are also tb-http-transport.yml and tb-coap-transport.yml

This Definition appears to be "huge" waste of space in the config. Maybe something like this:

                  rule-engine:
          
          
            
                  rule-engine: "${TB_QUEUE_KAFKA_RE_TOPIC_PROPERTIES:retention.ms:604800000;segment.bytes:26214400;retention.bytes:1048576000}"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -521,6 +521,48 @@ queue:
     batch.size: "${TB_KAFKA_BATCH_SIZE:16384}"
     linger.ms: "${TB_KAFKA_LINGER_MS:1}"
     buffer.memory: "${TB_BUFFER_MEMORY:33554432}"
